sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Documents: React.FC = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState<'clones' | 'text'>('clones'); // Mock government details - in real app, this would come from API const governmentDetails = { aadhaar: "1234 5678 9012 3456", pan: "ABCDE1234F", drivingLicense: "MH20 20220012345", passport: "A1234567", voterID: "ABC1234567", rationCard: "12345678901234567890", phoneNumber: user?.phoneNumber || "+91 9876543210", bankAccount: "1234567890123456", ifsc: "SBIN0001234", email: "ramesh.kumar@example.com" }; const DocumentClone = ({ type, title, data, bgColor, textColor, logoColor }: { type: string; title: string; data: any; bgColor: string; textColor: string; logoColor: string; }) => { const renderAadhaarCard = () => (
🏛️
Government of India
AADHAAR
👤

{user?.name || 'Ramesh Kumar'}

DOB: 01/01/1990
Gender: {user?.gender || 'Male'}
Father: Suresh Kumar
{data.aadhaar}
Address: {user?.city || 'Mumbai'}, {user?.state || 'Maharashtra'}, India
); const renderPANCard = () => (
🏛️
INCOME TAX DEPARTMENT
PAN
👤

{user?.name || 'RAMESH KUMAR'}

Father's Name: SURESH KUMAR
Date of Birth: 01/01/1990
{data.pan}
Permanent Account Number
); const renderDrivingLicense = () => (
🚗
DRIVING LICENSE
TRANSPORT
👤

{user?.name || 'RAMESH KUMAR'}

S/o: SURESH KUMAR

DOB: 01-01-1990
Issue Date: 01-01-2020
Valid Till: 01-01-2040
Vehicle Class: LMV, MCWG
{data.drivingLicense}
{user?.state || 'Maharashtra'} Transport Department
); const renderPassport = () => (
🛂
REPUBLIC OF INDIA
PASSPORT
👤

{user?.name || 'RAMESH KUMAR'}

Indian Citizen

Type: P
Date of Birth: 01 JAN 1990
Place of Birth: {user?.city || 'MUMBAI'}
Date of Issue: 01 JAN 2020
Date of Expiry: 01 JAN 2030
{data.passport}
Passport Number
); const renderDocument = () => { switch (type) { case 'aadhaar': return renderAadhaarCard(); case 'pan': return renderPANCard(); case 'driving': return renderDrivingLicense(); case 'passport': return renderPassport(); default: return (
📄

{title}

Document preview coming soon

); } }; return renderDocument(); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Government Documents

Access and manage all your government documents in one place

📄
{/* Tab Navigation */}
{/* Document Clones View */} {activeTab === 'clones' && (

Document Clones

Visual representations of your government documents

🆔 Aadhaar Card

💳 PAN Card

🚗 Driving License

🛂 Passport

)} {/* Text Summary View */} {activeTab === 'text' && (

Government Details Summary

All your government details in one organized view

{/* Identity Documents */}
🆔

Identity Documents

Aadhaar Number: {governmentDetails.aadhaar}
PAN Number: {governmentDetails.pan}
Voter ID: {governmentDetails.voterID}
Ration Card: {governmentDetails.rationCard}
{/* Travel Documents */}
✈️

Travel Documents

Passport Number: {governmentDetails.passport}
Driving License: {governmentDetails.drivingLicense}
Issue Date: 01-01-2020
Valid Till: 01-01-2040
{/* Personal Information */}
👤

Personal Information

Name: {user?.name || 'Ramesh Kumar'}
Phone Number: {governmentDetails.phoneNumber}
Email: {governmentDetails.email}
State: {user?.state || 'Maharashtra'}
{/* Financial Information */}
💰

Financial Information

Bank Account: {governmentDetails.bankAccount}
IFSC Code: {governmentDetails.ifsc}
Annual Income: ₹{user?.annualIncome?.toLocaleString() || '5,00,000'}
PAN Status: Active
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

)}
); }; export default Documents;
